questions.q: What is the name of your product or service?
What is the primary goal of your email campaign? (e.g., sales, awareness, engagement)
Who is your target audience? (e.g., age, profession, interests)
What is the tone of your brand? (e.g., professional, casual, humorous)
What key features or benefits do you want to highlight in the email?
What is the desired call to action? (e.g., buy now, subscribe, learn more)
Do you have any specific promotions or offers to include?
Would you like the email to include customer testimonials or reviews?

genCode.prompt: Create a compelling email campaign copy for a product or service named <<A1>>. The main goal of this campaign is <<A2>>, targeting an audience of <<A3>>. Ensure the tone reflects our brand's voice, which is <<A4>>. Highlight key features such as <<A5>>, and make sure to include a strong call to action of <<A6>>. If applicable, incorporate any promotions like <<A7>>, and include customer testimonials? <<A8>>. Deliver the email copy in a structured format suitable for immediate use.

testimonials.feedback: This tool has transformed how I create email content—fast and effective!
I love how easy it is to use this copy generator for my marketing needs.

faq.question: How does the email copy generator work?
faq.answer: Simply fill out the form with details about your product, audience, and goals, and the generator will create customized email copy for you.

faq.question: Can I use this tool for multiple campaigns?
faq.answer: Yes! You can create multiple email campaigns using the generator as needed.
